DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of undertaking this study is to examine the use of COPD Co-PilotTM, a COPD disease management program manufactured and operated by HGE Health Care Solutions, LLC, in COPD patients outside of the geographic base of HGE's existing patient population (Philadelphia, PA). The purpose is to demonstrate the feasibility of expanding the program to additional geographic sites and to examine whether similar outcome measures are achieved in patients under the supervision of health care providers that are new to the program.
